name: foodmiles
description: The item may have travelled too far before it reached the customer.

name: meat_in_sausages
pretty_name: Less than 80% of meat in sausages
description: The % of meat in the sausages receipt is less than 80%. Is that about spicies or starch?

name: soya_lecithin
description: Soya lecithin is in the ingredients, used likely as an emulsifier, replacing better quality ingredients, e.g. cocoa solids in chocolate. To grow soybeans, vast expanses of land in fragile ecosystems are put at risk in the Brazilian Cerrado, Amazon, Chaco and the Atlantic Forests of South America.

name: titanium
description: Titanium dioxide is in the ingredients.
